field.name: @sp1
field.label:
This option control visibility inside Ohanah's views.
Ohanah venue info can be displayed only where venue information is available. Those are: venue view (list of events limited to venue), single event view and registration. Use this to hide it from certain views if needed (for example you can hide it from single event view and registration)

field.description: Select whether to show or hide this module in the event view

field.name: show_in_venue_view
field.label: Show in venue view
field.description: Select whether to show or hide this module in the venue view
